name: <iter::adapters::chain::Chain<A, B> as iter::traits::double_ended::DoubleEndedIterator>::rfind
src:
fn rfind

(&mut self, mut predicate: P) -> Option where P: FnMut(&Self::Item) -> bool, { and_then_or_clear(&mut self.b, |b| b.rfind(&mut predicate)) .or_else(|| self.a.as_mut()?.rfind(predicate)) }
